blog.description: Jack Humphreys, Age 24, From Wales. I'm a Christian, animal lover, an animation fan and a gigantic nerd. Fan of Spider-man, Dragon Ball, DC and Marvel Comics, MLP, Harry Potter and a variety of other shows, movies, comics and books. I'm just here to have fun, do some good and talk about the things i like (And sometimes the stuff I don't).

summary: A few new scenes (I know that Charizard scene  and where Pikachu is like, "Hats off to you" are new) and extended shots such as...
body:
A few new scenes (I know that Charizard scene and where Pikachu is like, “Hats off to you” are new) and extended shots such as the better look at Blastoise. Also probably a few things I gif’d before but forgot we had seen already 😅

From the new Rita Ora song “Carry On.”

reblog.comment:
A few new scenes (I know that Charizard scene and where Pikachu is like, “Hats off to you” are new) and extended shots such as the better look at Blastoise. Also probably a few things I gif’d before but forgot we had seen already 😅

From the new Rita Ora song “Carry On.”

summary: So Detective Pikachu is coming out and we’ve been seeing big representations of the originals...For the Bulbasaur line they have...
body:
So Detective Pikachu is coming out and we’ve been seeing big representations of the originals…For the Bulbasaur line they have the village

For the Charmander line they have a whole Charizard fight

But we still have one more starter…Squirtle! We’ve seen Squirtle (maybe some of the others, I’ve been avoiding the most recent trailers in case of spoilers) but nothing significant yet, I propose that we get the Squirtle Squad

Imagine this but in live action. I would be SCREAMING!! And the fact that this is a plausible eventuality gets me even more hyped. Fingers crossed!

blog.name: cupcakedex
blog.title: The Cupcakedex
blog.description:
Pokemon-inspired foods every day! OC, reblogs and reposting with credit.
Includes a project to make 151 Pokemon - as cupcakes.

summary: I’m so excited to announce that The Cupcakedex is going to be hosting a Pokemon food-themed month with Fandom Foodies! For all...
caption:
I’m so excited to announce that The Cupcakedex is going to be hosting a Pokemon food-themed month with Fandom Foodies! For all of May, we’ll be celebrating #PokeNoms!

Fandom Foodies is a community of food bloggers who create dishes based on books, TV shows, movies, video games, and more. Every month, one blog hosts a different theme, such as a fandom, genre, or other topic, and absolutely anyone is welcome to make foods inspired by that theme. You don’t have to be an advanced baker or have a dedicated blog to get in on the fun - themed months are for everyone!

To celebrate Detective Pikachu coming out this May, we challenge anyone who’s ever wanted to make a Pokemon-inspired meal, treat, drink, or other dish to give it a go this month! Your food art can be based on a Pokemon, a character, a location, an in-game item, or anything else you can think of. Whether you’re a novice baker or professional chef, your culinary creations will star in our Hall of Fame Link-Up to be immortalized forever!

Anyone using the #PokeNoms hashtag on Tumblr, Instagram, or Twitter or submitting to the Link-Up to share their edible Pokemon creations will also be entered into a prize draw! Details to come!

#PokeNoms will begin May 1st and last until May 31st, so you have plenty of time to start planning your Pokemon food art! We can’t wait to see what you whip up!
